org.transitime.db.structs

Class CalendarDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.db.structs.CalendarDate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Entity
public class CalendarDate
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Contains data from the calendardates.txt GTFS file. This class is for reading/writing that data to the db.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public boolean addService()
